acf.description:
Let’s start 2021 off right, with the return of Marquee Trivia! Join us on Tuesday, January 12 at 7:30pm for another virtual trivia night, as we look back on the total mess of a year that 2020 was.

 

This online trivia night will be run through Zoom. Click the button to head to PayPal, purchase a pass, and then you will be redirected to the Zoom page to register. Note: do not exit out of the PayPal page! It will take a minute to redirect, please be patient.

 

 

Register For Trivia

 

 

How will this work?

 

Setup

Every team member must register here before the start of the trivia night! Registration is $6 per person, and you’ll get a personalized Zoom link emailed to you. Make sure you’ve downloaded and set up Zoom prior to the start time.

Teams are responsible for setting up communication between members on their own. You can do a group text, a Google hangout, or even all be together in the same room—as long as you’re being safe!

 

Gameplay

We’ll be broadcasting to you live, and running through seven rounds of questions as usual! The Zoom will open at 7:15pm, and trivia will start promptly at 7:30pm.

You’ll be submitting your answers through different Google Form links, which will be supplied to you at the start of each round. Every team will need to select one captain, who will be in charge of submitting the answers each round.

While we can’t safely let the winners come in person to pick from the famous grab bag, the winning team will get a choice between three mystery prize packs over Zoom, with delivery afterwards!

We’ve been working to figure out how we can keep trivia going during this unprecedented time—so join us on Tuesday, April 14 at 7:30pm as we experiment with our first ever Marquee Trivia Online! To join this first edition, we’re asking for a suggested donation of $6 (or more!), and we’ll be donating all of the net proceeds to help support our friends at the Brattle Theatre while they’re closed down.

 

This online trivia night will be run through Zoom. Click the button to head to PayPal, select a giving level, and then you will be redirected to the Zoom page to register. Note: do not exit out of the PayPal page! It will take a minute to redirect, please be patient.

 

 

Register For Trivia

 

 

How will this work?

 

Setup

Every team member must register here before the start of the trivia night! You’ll get a personalized Zoom link emailed to you. Make sure you’ve downloaded and set up Zoom prior to the start time.

Teams are responsible for setting up communication between members on their own. You can do a group chat, a Google hangout, or even all be together in the same room—as long as you’re being safe!

 

Gameplay

We’ll be broadcasting to you live, and running through seven rounds of questions as usual! You’ll be submitting your answers through different Google Form links, which will be supplied to you at the start of each round. Make sure you have a stable internet connection, because we’ll be sharing clips and audio as well.

Save the date! Our next trivia night is coming on March 5, back at the White Horse Tavern in Allston. Doors open at 6:30pm, and questions will begin at 7:30pm. We recommend getting there early to secure a good table!

This evening is being co-presented by the Boston Underground Film Festival. The winning team will receive a prize from the Festival.

location.address: White Horse Tavern, Brighton Avenue, Boston, MA, USA

acf.description: Save the date! Our third trivia night is coming on February 4th, back at the White Horse Tavern in Allston. With everyone’s favorite non-controversial awards show coming up, this month is focused on the Oscars: their near century-long history, that one time there was a streaker, and the occasionally acceptable choices. Join us for our night all about Hollywood’s biggest night!

location.address: White Horse Tavern, Brighton Avenue, Boston, MA, USA

acf.description:
Our second trivia night is coming on January 7th, back at the White Horse Tavern in Allston. We’ll be looking back at 2019, so now’s the time to start brushing up on box office stats or double check how many movies Keanu Reeves was in (it’s more than the two you’re thinking of). Doors will be at 7pm and questions will start at 7:30. We recommend getting there early to get a good table.

See you at trivia!

This event is being co-presented by The Brattle Theatre. The winning team will receive a prize from the theatre.

location.address: White Horse Tavern, Brighton Avenue, Boston, MA, USA

acf.description:
We’re excited to announce our Opening Night date and our venue! We’ll be at the White Horse Tavern in Allston on Thursday, December 5 for the first-ever Marquee Trivia. Come join us for movie marginalia, Oscars history, box office stats, and more! Doors open at 7:00pm, and questions will begin at 7:30pm. We recommend getting there early to secure a good table!

 

This event is co-presented by the Coolidge Corner Theatre; the winning team will receive six free passes to see a film at the theatre.

location.address: White Horse Tavern, Brighton Avenue, Boston, MA, USA
